favourite.article: This song is so amazing!!! It really touched me! Praise the Lord for His economy.
Amen to live a life with no regrets!
What a wonderful, wonderful song! Thank you!
Lord Jesus abound me with Your love. Make an abode in my heart.

無憾人生─為主而活 一、 馬利亞何能獻香膏？ 彼得何能答應你呼召？ 無數性命為這見證枉費、殉道。哦主！ 信徒們為何你外一無所顧？ (副一) 看見異象：基督與召會！ 估量無價，虧損萬事如土； 願付代價，獎賞是基督； 世界丟棄背後，焚毀一切退路。 他們的心為神經綸所奪， 豪邁人生無憾─為祂而活！ 二、 任憑別人多慮思考 世界榮華我再也不寶 服事你是最高職業、最好前途 我們見證：基督召會是我歸屬！ (副二) 看見異象：基督與召會！ 估量無價，虧損萬事如土； 願付代價，獎賞是基督； 世界丟棄背後，焚毀一切退路。 你們的心為神經綸所奪， 豪邁人生無憾─ 基督召會─是我們異象！ 估量無價，虧損萬事如土； 我們付代價贏得基督； 我們世途成燼，焚毀一切退路。 我們的心為神經綸所奪， 豪邁人生無憾─ 我們的心為神經綸所奪， 豪邁人生無憾─我為祂活！
This hymn encourages me to set my heart for living a life of no regrets after I graduate from FTTI.

Search Youtube for " A life of no Regrets " and "rladbsl" This Christian lady sings this song on Youtube. She posts many others songs she sings with the same burden of living all out to the glory of God in these last days.
Praise the Lord for God's economy. Lord make Your home in my heart!! Amen.
Lord may we pay the price to gain more of You! Lord we want to live a life of no regrets! as everything is part of Your arrangement : )
If we are a part of God's economy how can there be any regrets. The Lord loves us and it is an honor and privilege to love Him back.
It's the vision of God's economy that keeps me going on. This hymn reminds me to not look behind but forward towards the goal—to gain Christ and build the church.
On God's economy our hearts be set to live a life of no regrets.
A trained life is a life of no regrets. Amen..... makadasig ning kantaha ganahan ko
Amen, hallelujah! Love this song. :)
Lord, broaden our vision concerning the church. Amen.
We're for Christ and the Church! :) Hallelujah!

Praise the Lord for such a vision of Christ and the church. Seeing Christ is seeing His Body which is the church, the pillar and base of the truth. =) When we are in Christ we will have a Life of No regrets serving the Lord!
How we really need to see the vision of Christ and the church. Lord, thanks for the life that You gave to me, the life of no regrets.
We Christians should have these vision, Christ and the church so that we can be like Mary,who offered everything to Him and by this vision we can live a life with no regret.
The Lord is faithful to those who are faithful to Him. We should offer every single angle/details of our lives to Him and leave a life with no regrets.
Thank You Lord Jesus that were living a life of no regrets. PRAISE THE LORD!
A life of no regrets is a life full of Christ.
Because of Jesus, I am living a Life of No Regrets!!
We must give our all for Christ and the church. On God's economy our hearts are set to the Lord. Hallelujah!!!
As long as the vision we have seen is CLEAR we can say that we have a "life of no regret". Thank You Lord. Continue to preserve our heart loving You and the church.

Amen! None of us want to live a life in regrets. We don't want our life to be counted wasted before the Lord.And so, to live a life of no regrets is to in the divine life, enjoying Him as the unique source of everything, taking Him as our life and our person. This requires us to love Him with our best love. Through such kind of love, we will become willing to give all that we have: our education, our future, and our everything including our entire being. Only then that at the end of our course, we can boldly declare that truly, we lived a life of no regrets. May we all see the supreme preciousness and the surpassing greatness of our Lord, that we will be like Mary, wasted Her all for the Lord, and be like Peter, responded His call. Today is the best time for us; let us not wait for tomorrow to come: LET US ALL LIVE A LIFE OF NO REGRETS!
Amen. Praise the Lord for such a life having no regrets; just seeing the vision of Christ and the church.
We're for Christ and the church. This is now our testimony! Hallelujah.
Seeing the vision of Christ and the Church is really a life of no regrets.
Lord Jesus, thank You that we have no regrets.
Such a motivating hymn! Greetings from Malaysia.
When I first hear this song in Cebu with the FTTs, it really touched my heart and caused my eyes to tears. May the Lord caused us to live a life with no regrets. AMEN.
Thank you FTTM! Beutiful job singing! Hallelujah we are for Christ and the church!
Pay the price...by setting our heart on God's economy...to gain Christ! Live a life of NO REGRETS in our family, school, work place, etc. "Oh, Lord, we desire such a life!"
Serving You Lord, is the highest profession! Amen.
Set our heart on God's economy.This is a life of no regrets.
It is when our heart is set on His economy we can live a life of no regrets. Amen.
Burn the bridges, leave the world behind. Amen, Lord.
We've seen the vision of Christ and the church.
Pay the price. GIVE ALL OF OUR LIVES!
The best two years of my LIFE was JUST THE Beginning-A LIFE OF NO REGRETS! Others have considerations, when serving You Lord, is the highest profession!!!
Hallelujah!!! We've seen the vision.
Amen! Live a life of no regrets.
We'll live a life of no regrets when we set our hearts on God's economy! We must clearly vision of Christ and the Church!
a life lived to and for the Lord IS a life of no regrets :)
No regrets, Lord. Here I am...
Serving You, Lord, is the highest profession. On God's economy our heart are set. :) Hallelujah!!!
Praise the Lord! Live a live of no regrets!
Amen! We're living a life of no regrets!
